Does not crease on my greasy hooded eyes. I’d stock up on more but there’s so much product in each of these tubes and creme products don’t store as well as powder.

product_name: KVD Vegan Beauty Crush - Technicolor Crayon Set
user_specs: ['Skin Tone Fair']
review_content:
Not just a typical eyeliner. These are vibrant, LONG wear, bright af, pigments. Kat Von D knows what she's doing with makeup. When I swatched these on just the back of my hand, they were there for 48 hours.. that's with multiple hand washing! I finally had to use an oil based makeup remover to get the swatches off. Not sure I'd use these in the waterline, but as a liner to add a bold pop of color? Heck yeah!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: This product is highly pigmented and does not budge once set in place. I swatched all three colors on the back of my hand to test the wear time, so far I’ve washed and sanitize my hands multiple times without the swatches moving. Can’t wait for future colors.

product_name: KVD Vegan Beauty Crush - Technicolor Crayon Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
Most KVD products are failed for me, but this set is surprisingly cool. Products are made in Italy. Intended for use as face paint. Only Electric Blue has an eye-safe symbol on it. Bubblegum has Red 28 which is Fluorescent color, and Red 7. FDA is not permitted for use in products intended for use on area around the eye. Wild Orange has Red 6 which is also not permitted for use in products intended for use on area around the eye as well. Red 6, 7 are approved to use of these coloring on lips, so this is more likely same as you are applying lipstick or face paint color which has Red 6, 7, and 28 everywhere on your face including eye area. I tested all 3 colors on my eyelid anyway (not inner rim), and results are no allergic reaction, no crease, creamy and pigmented (swatches are same as shown on the website), set fast, and last all day. These crayons need powerful cleansing oil/cleanser to remove, pink and orange need double cleansing as they might leave stain. Also when I mix blue pink, they create a bright cute pastel purple :) very fun and versatile set to use. I am happy with this purchase.

product_name: KVD Vegan Beauty Crush - Technicolor Crayon Set
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_title: creamy and pigmented, but what for?
review_content:
these colors are absolutely beautiful and look like they would create a great look. the blue states that cannot be used on the lips so I did it as a water line type eyeliner. It lasted maybe 30 minutes however nothing stays on my waterline. the orange and pink states that they cannot be used on the eyes. not sure exactly what these products are supposed to be for since Kat Von D has not stated anything about these products. maybe they are supposed to be used on your face for theatrical looks? all three are super creamy and pigmented might try the orange and pink as top eyeliner even though they say not to be used on the eyes.
